ygData.subject: Re: stupid question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... quests so I ... hail the ... them but I ... them first ... Here are some basic guidelines for quests: Hail the NPC Always read thru the dialogue If the npc
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Nefrahari@a... wrote:
> Okay this question is very stupid but I haven't done a lot of the
quests so I
> don't know. When you go to turn in your quest items, do you need to
hail the
> person first? Because when I just gave them the items, they took
them but I
> got no rewards. So I'm guessing that happened because I didn't hail
them first
> but wanted to be sure that was the reason.
>
> "Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."

Here are some basic guidelines for quests:
Hail the NPC
Always read thru the dialogue
If the npc gives you a container, HOLD ON TO IT.(i've known people
who have actually gotten rid of them) If the container has a combine
button, make sure you hit it before turn in.
If the npc wants more than 1 of the same item, make sure they aren't
stacked
I personally will always hail the npc again even after I have
collected the pieces for a quest just to be sure I have the right
stuff.
I also recommend checking out Allakhazams' website for quest info or
ask on this message board.
Hope this helps out.
